title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not always close all the open editors.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open editors should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, open multiple editors. 
2. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt). 
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
